title: Synthesis = Synthese. No. 1/7? [French language]
brief_description:
French cinemagazine covering the broad areas of science, medicine and technology. Items: 1. Profile of a leading French mineralogist. 2. Brief story on scientific publishing. 3. Story on an attempt to transcribe the language of crows in order to produce new audio scarecrows. 4. Advances in renal surgery; the Ariane rocket; deep-sea oceanography.
Suitable for senior students.
